div.p: This code system http://ibm.com/fhir/cdm/CodeSystem/process-meta-primary-or-secondary defines the following codes:

tr.td: Primary data originates from the source system or the data integrator.
Secondary data is transalated or derived data produced by a data processor that aggregates, interprets, derives or in some other way processes and enhances the source data.

description.value: Identifies the origin of the data elements from primary or secondary systems

definition.value: Primary data originates from the source system or the data integrator.
Secondary data is transalated or derived data produced by a data processor that aggregates, interprets, derives or in some other way processes and enhances the source data.
